dbName.description: the name of the database within its cloud container

baseUri.description: the baseUri for the container, without trailing slash (e.g., https://containers.itwinjs.org)

containerId.description: the containerId of this cloud container. Usually a GUID

isPublic.description: whether the cloud container is public (doesn't require authentication)

includePrerelease.description: include prerelease version as acceptable versions

prefetch.description: if true, pre-fetch all of the data from the cloud in the background
